subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
Television
lead_paragraph: Knicks fans haven’t forgotten Game 1 of the Knicks-Pacers playoff series in 1995 when Reggie Miller scored 8 points in 18.7 seconds for the Pacers. Miller returns to the Garden as a TV analyst for Game 2.
